Title: VINTAGE AVON 'GENUINE ONYX BEADED WATCH' MOTHER OF PEARL FACE SECOND HAND QUARTZ
ConditionDescription: Good condition.  Watch works great and keeps good time.  The mother of pearl face is lovely and crystal shows no scratches or scuffs.  The black onyx is in good condition, the antiqued silver tone finish shows a little wear on some of the filigree panels.  Clasp holds securely. See photos.
Description: Vintage AVON 'GENUINE ONYX BEADED WATCH' Watch runs great. It has second hand, quartz movement and stainless steel back. Art Deco inspired design. Pretty mother of pearl oval face set in antiqued silver tone filigree look case with black onyx insets. Band is alternating antiqued silver tone filigree look panels and genuine black onyx beads. Closes with fold over clasp, which closes securely. Watch fits 6-3/4 inch wrist. Sadly, it is not adjustable. Watch works great and keeps good time. The mother of pearl face is lovely and crystal shows no scratches or scuffs. The black onyx is in good condition, the antiqued silver tone finish shows a little wear on some of the filigree panels.
